title: The First Meeting
text: It was a warm summer evening when our paths first crossed. A chance encounter at a friend's party, and suddenly the world felt a little brighter. Little did we know, this was just the beginning of an incredible journey together.

title: The First Date
text: Nervous butterflies and endless conversations. We talked for hours, losing track of time. That first date felt like coming home, even though we were just getting to know each other.

title: Falling in Love
text: Autumn leaves were falling, and so were we—head over heels. Every moment together felt magical. The way you laugh, the way you care, it all clicked into place.

quiz.question: Where did we have our first kiss?

title: The Proposal
text: On bended knee, with trembling hands and a heart full of love, I asked the most important question of my life. Your 'yes' changed everything, and we began planning our forever.

title: Our Wedding Day
text: The day we became one. Surrounded by family and friends, we promised to love, honor, and cherish each other. The most beautiful day of our lives, filled with joy, laughter, and endless love.

title: Our First Home
text: The keys to our first home together. Empty rooms filled with dreams, walls waiting for memories. We painted, decorated, and made it ours—a place where love would grow and flourish.

title: Adventures Together
text: From mountain peaks to ocean shores, we've explored the world hand in hand. Every trip, every adventure, every sunset watched together has been a chapter in our love story.

quiz.question: What was our favorite travel destination?

title: Life's Milestones
text: Through career changes, new beginnings, and life's ups and downs, we've been each other's constant. Every challenge faced together made us stronger, every joy shared made us happier.

title: 25 Years Later
text: Here we are, 25 years later. Still laughing, still loving, still choosing each other every single day. Our journey has been filled with countless beautiful moments, and we're excited for all the chapters yet to come.
